name: Default Media Library View
author: Martin Miller

sections.description: It’s simple! Just a pair of radio buttons at the bottom of the user profile page in the WordPress Admin area, allowing a user to select the default media library view, ‘grid’ or ‘list’.
sections.installation:
1. Upload default-media-view to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work with multisite?

Yes, on a site-by site basis. An option for detecting multisite and network-wide setting of default media view is planned.

short_description: Adds a media library default view selection to the user profile page.
description: It’s simple! Just a pair of radio buttons at the bottom of the user profile page in the WordPress Admin area, allowing a user to select the default media library view, ‘grid’ or ‘list’.
